Generated Narrative: ValueSet IMMZD18SDTPPregnancyStartingWith4DosesVS

This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

SystemCodeDisplay
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK  The primary DTP series has been completed, first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered and client is currently pregnant-276The primary DTP series has been completed, first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered and client is currently pregnant
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK  Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK  Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed.-260Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed.

name: IMMZD18SDTPPregnancyStartingWith4DosesVS
title: IMMZD18SDTPPregnancyStartingWith4Doses ValueSet for Decision Table
description:
ValueSet IMMZD18SDTPPregnancyStartingWith4Doses for IMMZ.D18.S.DTP.Pregnancy starting with 4 doses schedule.
Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule
Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any
Table: Diphtheria and tetanus vaccination schedule in pregnant women who received 4 childhood diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) doses

concept.code: The primary DTP series has been completed, first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered and client is currently pregnant-276
concept.display: The primary DTP series has been completed, first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered and client is currently pregnant

concept.code: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140
concept.display: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

concept.code: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed.-260
concept.display: Third tetanus and diphtheria-containing booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed.
